title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Starting Pickett, Roquan Smith Contract, Fake Q’s on Watson Week 12
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Starting Pickett, Roquan Smith Contract, Fake Q’s on Watson Week 12
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), how the NFL will handle Deshaun Watson’s Week 12 return from suspension, who deserves the blame for Daniel Jones not working out in New York, what major change Colin’s sources are telling him could be coming to MLB, if USC has any regrets over ditching the Pac-12 for B1G cash, and if Dana White should buckle under media pressure and pay his fighters more. 

Then, former Bears & Dolphins HC and Cowboys DC Dave Wannstedt and Colin discuss if Kenny Pickett should be the Steelers Week 1 starter (11:00), if Tom Brady’s extended training camp leave could result in a slow start for the Bucs (15:00), why coaches prefer training camp scrimmages to preseason games (22:00), if a slow Cowboys start could mean an early ax for Mike McCarthy (25:00), if the Bears should pay Roquan Smith or trade him for assets (27:00), if Justin Fields will make it to a third year in Chicago (32:00), and Dave’s biggest NFL sleeper team (36:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
